page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: This is a predominantly agricultural area with many farms in it.The farmland is fertile and is used mainly for dairy farming and crops of grass, corns(especially barley)and potatoes. Many of the farms are old established farms.The largest centre of populatian is Hornby village.This small village developed around the castle and many of the buildings are associated with the castle.There is quite an expanse of woodland near the castle-some of this is newly planted with conifers and is reserved for rearing pheasants. There is also a series of lakes running south and east from the castle On one of these lakes is a duck decoy.
